_header: Welcome nephew welcome my cousin dear
Subjects: pageant verses; occasional verse; Worcester; Henry VII
_description: Pageant verses to Henry VII in A.D. 1486 at Worcester — twenty-three stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottJulBXII.First Lines:
Welcome nevew welcome my cousyn dereNext of my blood
                    descended by alyauunce…
BLCottJulBXII.Last Lines:
…In token wherof I yelde to þou the kengeNow al this cite
                    seith welcome to your ovne
BLCottJulBXII.Note: Folio number reflects the most recent foliation.
